SKT_FIRST.name: All Hail Mother Nature
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Destroy Civilization
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases all allies' Attack for 1 turn
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 1ターンの間味方全体の攻撃力UP
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 提升友军攻击力,持续1回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Increases Attack Increase duration by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 攻击力提升持续时间+1回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Blooming Poison
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Poisoned</color> on a selected target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、選択した敵単体に<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 선택한 대상 한 명에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>중독</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并对1名所选目标造成<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Poisoned on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After using a skill, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で中毒を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:スキル使用後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 중독을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 스킬 사용 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh:
<color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对全体敌人造成中毒效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:使用技能后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升
<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
